xmpp.DateTime

type
class
available in
flash, js, neko, php
Standardization of ISO 8601 profiles and their lexical representation.
XMPP Date and Time Profiles

Static Variables

ereg_date(default,null) : EReg

UTC date expression. CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssTZD

ereg_time(default,null) : EReg

UTC time expression. hh:mm:ss.sssTZD

Static Methods

inline fromDate(d : Date, ?offset : Int) : String

inline fromTime(t : Float, ?offset : Int) : String

getParts(utc : String) : Array<Int>

inline isValidDate(t : String) : Bool

inline isValidTime(t : String) : Bool

inline now(?offset : Int) : String

toDate(utc : String) : Date

utc(t : String, ?offset : Int) : String

Formats a (regular) date string to a XMPP compatible UTC date string (CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssTZD)
For example: 2008-11-01 18:45:47 gets 2008-11-01T18:45:47Z
Optionally a timezone offset could be attached.
